stage_heroText: Combining Frontend Development, with Cinematic Drone footage, and user-centric UI Designs to tell your unique story with depth, clarity, and beauty
stage_aboutText: üëã I'm Enrique, Frontend Developer with a passion for creating beautiful digital experiences
stage_aboutText2: With a strong eye for design, I build responsive, high-performance interfaces that are intuitive, accessible, and visually engaging.
stage_aboutListItem5: üé• Visual storytelling that leaves an impression
stage_key_offering_headline: Professional Creative Solutions to bring your Vision to Life
stage_keyOfferings_userInterfaceDescript: Beautifully intuitive interfaces and frontend craftsmanship
stage_keyOfferings_webDevelopmentDescrip: Websites that tell your story clearly.
stage_keyOfferings_droneDescription: Design into pixel-perfect, functional, and elegant web and mobile applications.
stage_whyMe_provenExperienceDescription: Years of experience across industries, working through clarity, care, and meaningful results.
stage_whyMe_remoteExpertiseDescription: Supporting clients across the globe, especially if design is needed, and/or in remote areas.
stage_whyMe_flexibleAdaptiveDescription: Whether you need a short/small collaboration or full project, I adapt to your rhythm and goals.
stage_ctaHeadline: Ready to elevate your digital presence or see how my unique skills can benefit you?
article_paragraphs_p1: My path has never been a straight one. It‚Äôs moved through art, design, architecture, and technology, but as languages I‚Äôve learned to speak with my hands and heart.
article_paragraphs_p2: I love building digital experiences that are clear. I care about design that feels intuitive. I find joy in the process of creating, and in helping others express their ideas that matter.
article_paragraphs_p3: These days, I work with people who want to build things that feel real.
article_paragraphs_p4: When I‚Äôm not creating, I‚Äôm probably flying my drone, taking black & white photographs.
company1_name: Sembo - Stena Line Travel Group AB
company1_details:
Rebuilt main website.
Collaborated closely with other Engineers, UI/UX team to establish and shape a design system.
Updated new fresh corporate colors, typography, spacing and other variables across legacy sites and laying the base foundation of the new theme to the main site and project.
Worked closely with Marketing and UI/UX team to enhance the traveler's experience, while contributing daily with team mates building components and updating them to add to the project.
company2_details:
Developed and implemented Design System for both the company's Web apps and corporate website.
Facilitated collaborative team sessions, introducing the Design System to external teams, and provide coaching to employees to effectively work on the CMS and internal applications.
Conducted research, reviewed customer feedback, and conducted employee interview to drive improvement to the internal web applications to efficiently and effectively employing faster processing and workflows to increase productivity.
company3_details:
Served as a mentor and coach for new team members, new trainee employees, and developed educational material and career plans for Frontend Development. Facilitated team sessions using design thinking techniques.
Worked with different Agile teams, cross-functional teams. Focused in multi-page web app projects for various clients, Responsive cross-browser compatibility website projects with some projects focused on accessibility, documented components, and Design Systems for various clients. Built Landing pages, Proof of Concept projects, and projects under NDA for various clients.
Contributed to Open Source Projects and in-house projects: Coding guidelines and VEAMS Framework
company4_details:
Specializing in video technology and media distribution, working closely with small teams, learning new technologies, tools, and best practices.
Contributing to/and Improving UI/UX on various video projects in the frontend: Cloud Software Component to generate Virtual linear channels, B2B Admin Management Portals, and a Video Stream Corruptor to simulate traffic issues.
Designing and building Landing pages for various video web applications with the latest tools and frameworks.
company5_details: Designed and developed iteratively on Websites and Mobile Hybrid applications, Worked closely with IT team and Back-End Developers to improve and build better user interfaces and user experiences. Created and built user flows, wireframes, designed high-quality mockups, and built live Prototypes, and websites using CSS frameworks: Bootstrap, Foundation, and jQuery tools: jQuery UI, jQuery Mobile...
company6_details:
Responsible to create a Responsive Web Design for their corporate website and build the Website according to the Designs as well as a Wordpress website for one of their Services.
Created new logos for their services. Worked together with team members within each department to improve SEO performance.
Coached employers in how to work with Wordpress.
project1_shortDesc: Best for flexible travel, car holidays, flights, hotels, and holiday homes.
project1_overview: Developed and implemented a new marketplace for the main company's website, focusing on offering a flexible travel experience for their customers that include travel options like car holidays, flights, hotels, and holiday homes.
project1_team: Product manager, Software developers, Frontend, Marketing, Devops, UI/UX Designers
project1_tools: Next.js, React, Sanity(CMS), HTML5, CSS3, CSSinJS, Figma
project1_solutions: Building a marketplace with a CMS and using a framework, create base foundation, compose reusable components, create storybook, build end-to-end tests, collaborating with marketing and UX to enhance the user experience and shape a design system.
project1_contributionsSubheadlineText1: Understanding the Problem and Stakeholder Needs
project1_contributionsText1: The first step was to collaborate closely with the UI/UX team, marketing team, and product manager to understand the goals and pain points. The challenge was rebuilding a user-friendly marketplace where we could integrate various flexible travel options. Before this I pitched the idea of establishing a strong design system to ensure consistency across all areas.
project1_contributionsText2: Worked closely with the UI/UX team to help bridge the gap between design and development by clearly communicating how the design system would be implemented. Created Design brief and used Figma to create a comprehensive design system, which I then presented to management to gain buy-in and set expectations.
project1_keyResultsText2: Established a comprehensive design system that improved collaboration between design and development teams
project1_keyResultsText3: Enhanced the customer journey with a streamlined interface for booking flexible travel options.
project2_shortDesc: Pre-Employment Screening, Risk Management and Compliance in Germany.
project2_overview: Develop and implement a comprehensive Design System for the company's web applications and corporate website.
project2_team: Managing Director, Various Departments, Marketing, DevOps
project2_tools: Django, WordPress, HTML5, SASS, CSS3, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, Figma
project2_solutions: Together with the Signum Consulting team created a plan and strategy to build a design system. Redesigned the UI and different elements (logos, images, etc) and implemented. Facilitating collaborative team sessions, introducing the Design System to external teams, and providing coaching to employees to use the CMS and internal applications.
project2_figcaption2: Signum-Consult - Responsive Web and Mobile Site

project3_solutions: Worked closely together with UI/UX designers and BE Developers to translate designs into code, ensuring that the usability worked well in different browsers while keeping in mind the maintainability, scalability and reliability of the products or projects. Developed and documented components and into a design system for each project and product. Components being fully responsive, ensuring accessibility standards optimized for mobile, and optimized for performance, later to be tested across devices and browsers to deliver the best user experience to users.

Built reusable components to build the responsive landing page. Login and registration. And collaborated with BE to implement login and registration.

services_description: Between creativity and technology, I provide tailored solutions to elevate your digital presence. Whether you need a refresh of an existing project, a modern website optimized for desktop and mobile, or a custom design system to streamline your development process, I bring creative and technical expertise to meet your unique needs. With over a decade of experience across industries like travel, real estate, bakery, auto mechanics, sports, and digital media, I am here to help bring your vision to life.
services_travelAndTourismDescription: Building marketplaces and travel websites to simplify bookings.
services_riskManagementDescription: Web application to meet compliance requirements and streamline processes for regulated industries.
services_preEmploymentScreeningDescripti: Digital solutions for efficient and secure hiring processes websites.
services_immigrationServicesDescription: Developing web applications to support immigration systems.
services_chambersOfCommerceDescription: Websites for economic organizations for better connectivity and productivity.
services_sportsAndClubsDescription: Creating web & mobile sites to support sports organizations and member engagement.
services_streamingServicesDescription: Showcase video streaming solutions for teams building on-demand.
services_realEstateDescription: Websites to showcase properties and enhance the user search experience.
service_buildingMaterialsDescription: Providing web applications for cement providers.
service_healthSafetyDescription: Web tools and systems to improve safety standards and ensure compliance.

service_ctaHeadline: Ready to transform your vision? Whether you need a new website, help refining an existing project, or a custom solution for your industry, I‚Äôm here to make it happen. Let‚Äôs work together!
